com.digi.xbee.api

Class DigiPointNetwork

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.digi.xbee.api.XBeeNetwork
      • com.digi.xbee.api.DigiPointNetwork

  • public class DigiPointNetwork
extends XBeeNetwork
    This class represents a DigiPoint Network.

    The network allows the discovery of remote devices in the same network as the local one and stores them.

    See Also:
    DigiMeshNetwork, Raw802Network, XBeeNetwork, ZigBeeNetwork
